name: LiteMultiCopter
body:
这是一个基于Arduino MEGA 2560,传感器MPU6050，富斯CT6B遥控器的四轴飞行器飞控程序
![arduino板](http://arduino.cc/en/uploads/Main/ArduinoMega2560_R3_Front_450px.jpg)
![MPU6050模块](http://img02.taobaocdn.com/bao/uploaded/i2/16032018692934220/T103EpXaXXXXXXXXXX_!!0-item_pic.jpg_310x310.jpg)
![富斯CT6B遥控器](http://img04.taobaocdn.com/bao/uploaded/i4/T1qoN2XhtdXXaXyAE3_050650.jpg_310x310.jpg)
